verbose_text: To assess the potential effect of Rhodiola rosea on the expression of TIPE2, Bcl-2, FaS and FasL in CLP induced mice, their protein and mRNA levels were determined using RT-qPCR and western blot analyses, respectively, in thymic T cells of mice at 24 h after CLP challenge, which was performed 8 h after pre-treatment with Rhodiola rosea extract.
evidence: expression of TIPE2, Bcl-2, FaS and FasL
